title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather requirements for the ConflictResolutionAdvisor system, including the types of conflicts it should address, the target users, and the desired outcomes. Define the project scope and create a high-level system architecture.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the ConflictResolutionAdvisor system, including the input methods for describing conflicts, the presentation of guidance and recommendations, and the overall user experience.

title: Develop Conflict Analysis Engine
description: Develop the core AI engine that analyzes the input conflict scenarios and generates appropriate guidance and recommendations for resolution.

title: Implement Data Storage and Retrieval
description: Design and implement the data storage and retrieval system for the ConflictResolutionAdvisor, including storing conflict scenarios, recommendations, and user feedback.

title: Develop User Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure secure access to the ConflictResolutionAdvisor system and protect user data.
